attributes.action: Make Tony Blair a LORD Anthony Blair
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make old tony a lord, yes he made some hard decisions and make some wrong ones, but on a whole he done a very good job in leading the best country in the world, we now have less un-employment, more money in hospitals, i believe we are living in a safer country, and we have had 10 fantastic years or Tonys priemership. Sign my petition, and lets see Lord Tony !!!!!!!!

rejection.details: I'm not sure the PM can make himself a Lord!
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
